Title: Amazon seeks to settle EU antitrust e-book investigation - source
Short Description: Amazon is talking to European Union antitrust regulators about settling a year-long investigation into its e-book deals with publishers without a fine, a person familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.

Title: Cue music: Some Ford cars to link with Amazon's Alexa home voice system
Short Description: Some Ford <F.N> owners will soon be able to turn up the heat at home from their cars using Amazons <AMZN.O> Alexa voice service or start their vehicles from their desks using the same system.

Title: Protection of Amazon's biodiversity could fuel 'fourth industrial revolution':  study
Short Description: The Amazon rainforest holds the biological keys to kick-start a "fourth industrial revolution" if its biodiversity is protected, said a study published on Friday.

Title: Amazon launches voice-powered Echo speakers in Britain and Germany
Short Description: Online retailer Amazon brought Echo, its voice-activated smart home controls device to Britain and Germany on Wednesday, hoping the Star Trek-inspired gadget will replicate the success it has seen in the United States.

Title: Wells Fargo, Amazon end deal to offer discounted student loans
Short Description: Wells Fargo & Co and Amazon.com Inc said they had ended a partnership to offer discounted student loans to the online retailer's "Prime Student" customers, about six weeks after announcing the deal.

Title: Amazon launches Amazon Vehicles to help car buyers
Short Description: Amazon.com <AMZN.O> on Thursday launched Amazon Vehicles, an online platform for users to research on cars, auto parts and accessories.

Title: Amazon steps up British investment with Tilbury distribution center

Title: Amazon's new UK distribution center to create 500 jobs in 2017
Short Description: Online retailer Amazon plans to create 500 new jobs when it opens another distribution center in northern England next year, it said on Friday.

Title: Amazon Japan raided on suspicion of antitrust practices: Nikkei
Short Description: Japan's Fair Trade Commission has raided the offices of Amazon.com Inc's <AMZN.O> local unit on suspicion of pressuring retailers to offer products at lower prices than on rival sites, the Nikkei business daily said on Monday.

Title: Amazon tops Wall Street targets, lifted by cloud revenue

Title: Amazon gets permission from UK to explore drone deliveries
Short Description: Amazon.com Inc said on Monday it has entered into a partnership with the British government to speed up the process for allowing small drones to makes deliveries.

Title: Amazon enters student loan business in partnership with Wells Fargo
Short Description: Amazon.com Inc is entering the student loan business in a partnership with Wells Fargo & Co, offering cheaper rates for loans to Amazon customers who pay for a "Prime Student" subscription.

Title: Amazon UK says no Brexit hit to sales so far

Title: Bezos says Amazon to up India investment to $5 billion
Short Description: Amazon Inc Chief Executive Jeff Bezos said on Tuesday the company would invest an additional $3 billion in India, boosting its committed investment in the country to over $5 billion.

Title: Trump says Amazon.com has 'a huge antitrust problem'
Short Description: U.S. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Thursday that Amazon.com, the world's biggest online retailer, has "a huge antitrust problem."

Title: Trump says Amazon.com has 'a huge antitrust problem'
Short Description: U.S. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Thursday that Amazon.com, the world's biggest online retailer, has "a huge antitrust problem."

Title: Jeremy Clarkson goes on a 'Grand Tour' for Amazon car show
Short Description: Former BBC "Top gear" host Jeremy Clarkson's new car show will be called "The Grand Tour" because it will be recorded in a big tent pitched in different countries for each episode, maker Amazon said on Wednesday.

Title: Amazon takes aim at YouTube with new video service
Short Description: Amazon.com Inc <AMZN.O> launched a service on Tuesday that allows users to post videos and earn royalties from them, setting up the world's biggest online retailer to compete directly with Alphabet Inc's <GOOGL.O> YouTube.

Title: Amazon's profit and revenue surge sweeps away doubts

Short Description: Amazon.com Inc <AMZN.O> on Thursday reported profit and revenue that blew past analysts' expectations, sending its shares soaring in after-hours trading and demonstrating the growing market power of its core retail business and new cloud services division.

Title: Amazon found liable for charges incurred by kids using apps
Short Description: Amazon.com Inc is liable for billing parents for in-app purchases that their children made without permission, a federal judge has judge has decided, in a ruling that resolves accusations similar to ones that Apple Inc and Google Inc settled two years ago.

Title: Amazon names Doug Gurr UK country manager
Short Description: Online retailer Amazon on Wednesday named Doug Gurr as the firm's new UK country manager, moving him from the same role in China.

Title: Fight against illegal Amazon gold mining intensifies
Short Description: After trekking nearly two hours through dense jungle, Brazilian environmental special forces burst into a clearing where the trees had been sawn and a muddy crater dug: an illegal gold mine on indigenous land in the heart of the Amazon.

Title: Daimler confirms HERE in talks with Amazon, Microsoft
Short Description: Amazon.com and Microsoft are in talks about taking a minority stake in HERE, a digital mapping business controlled by Germany's luxury carmakers to help develop self-driving cars, Daimler said on Wednesday.

Title: Amazon says home services orders grew 20 percent per month since launch
Short Description: Amazon.com Inc said on Wednesday customer orders for home services like plumbing and mounting TVs had increased 20 percent per month on average since the online retailer launched the platform last year.

Title: Amazon being probed for alleged tax evasion in Italy: Bloomberg
Short Description: Amazon.com Inc is under investigation in Italy for alleged tax evasion, the company's chief for Italy and Spain Francois Nyuts told Bloomberg.

Title: Amazon to start air delivery network with leasing deal
Short Description: Amazon.com Inc <AMZN.O> said on Wednesday it had signed a deal to lease 20 Boeing <BA.N> 767 widebody freighter aircraft to handle more of its own deliveries in the United States.

Title: Top Amazon executive to take two-year post with Italian prime minister

Title: Amazon steps up recruitment as it expands in Europe

Title: Amazon ads for Nazi-themed TV show pulled from N.Y. subway

Title: Amazon may export delivery lessons from India to cut costs abroad
Short Description: E-commerce giant Amazon.com is taking lessons learnt from its daily battles with India's choked roads and cramped cities to some of its largest developed markets, exporting a model of cheaper deliveries and reduced warehousing costs.

Title: Amazon.com escapes trademark suit after appeals court reverses itself
Short Description: Amazon.com Inc did not violate the trademarks of a high-end watchmaker by offering alternative brands with similar styles in its search results, a federal appeals court ruled on Wednesday.

Title: UPDATE 1-Amazon launches platform to build apps for "Internet of Things"
Short Description: Amazon.com Inc's cloud business, Amazon Web Services, has launched a service to help customers build applications to connect devices through the cloud, the so-called "Internet of Things".

Title: Amazon rolls out new services for cloud

Title: Amazon announces TV pilot lineup for fall season

Title: Amazon announces low-cost tablet, new Fire TV

Title: Amazon to offer loans to sellers in China, 7 other countries

Title: EU anti-trust chief warns Amazon, wary about telecom mergers

Title: EU opens investigation into Amazon's e-book business

Title: Amazon's Europe changes to boost tax bill, add secrecy

Title: Amazon.com expands into professional services with home marketplace

Short Description: After years of giving investors the cold shoulder, Amazon.com Inc <AMZN.O> is starting to warm up to Wall Street.

Title: Amazon adds bidding option to site for fine art, collectibles

Title: 'Everything I Never Told You' is Amazon's book of the year

Short Description: Diverging high court rulings in New York and Illinois over 'Amazon taxes' point to a possible U.S. Supreme Court case to settle questions about the legality of states taxing online retail sales, lawyers said on Monday.

Title: "Fifty Shades Freed" most popular book on Amazon in 2012
Short Description: E.L. James' erotic romance novel "Fifty Shades Freed: Book Three of the Fifty Shades Trilogy" was the best-selling book on Amazon this year, followed by the thriller "Gone Girl," the online retailer said on Friday.
